alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LACKAWANNA...EASTERN LUZERNE AND SOUTHEASTERN WYOMING COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glendale, or 9 miles southeast of Pittston, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Plains, Carbondale, Old Forge, Pittston, Archbald, and Blakely. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
